name: Blighted Gloom
effects: Physical dark damage (2x, ATK) to all enemies
Increase resistance to Blind by 100% for all allies for 3 turns

desc_long: Deals dark damage to all enemies, and boosts resistance to blind for all allies.
對全體敵人發動暗屬性攻擊並提高全體隊員失明耐性的數值。
